name: This is Fine (D5R, wonglee)
description:
A puzzle game based on that dog comic script. Keep the dog alive while burning all the furniture. Everything will be fine!

Submitted to the Ludum Dare 46 Game Jam with the theme: "Keep it Alive"

Credits:
Design & Programming: Tamiko Tadeo (@D5R) & Christopher Wong (@wonglee) & Kenny Cheung
Art and Animations: Nancy Chen (@ncheny) & Danielle Ragas

Update: Added a couple more levels and fixed a fatal error in webGL build
